#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1000005];
int temp[1000005];
void sort(int low,int high)
{
	int l,h,mid,k;
	mid=(low+high)/2;
	k=0;
	l=low;
	h=mid+1;
	while(l<=mid&&h<=high)
	{
		if(arr[l]<arr[h])
		{
			temp[k++]=arr[l++];
		}
		else
		{
			temp[k++]=arr[h++];
		}
		
	}
	while(l<=mid)
	{
		temp[k++]=arr[l++];
	}
	while(h<=high)
	{
		temp[k++]=arr[h++];
	}
	k=0;
	for(int i=low;i<=high;i++)
	{
		arr[i]=temp[k++];
	}
}
void merge(int low,int high)
{
	if(low<high)
	{
		int mid=low+(high-low)/2;
		merge(low,mid);
		merge(mid+1,high);
		sort(low,high);
	}
	
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>arr[i];
		}
		merge(0,n-1);
		
		for(i=0,j=n-1;i<j;i++,j--)
		{
			cout<<arr[j]<<" ";
			cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
		}
		if(i==j)
		cout<<arr[i];
		cout<<endl;
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
